statements: DELETE FROM food_journal WHERE user_id = 'd6f8be88-1bda-43ab-8d0d-2cd92bd7a3cc' AND meal_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM food_journal WHERE calories > 500 AND meal_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM meals WHERE calories > 500 and meal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meal_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND log_date < '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM meals WHERE meal_date >= '2022-01-01' AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM trends WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com');
